title: Coordinate Utility Transfer for Closing
description: A few days before closing, the TC needs to remind the buyer and seller to arrange for the transfer of utilities.

tasks.description: Retrieve the contact information for the local utility companies (electric, water, gas).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of names and phone numbers for the relevant utility providers.

tasks.description: Send a reminder email to the buyer with instructions on how to set up new service in their name.
tasks.expected_outcome: A helpful reminder email with the utility contact list is sent to the buyer.

tasks.description: Send a separate reminder email to the seller with instructions on how to schedule the termination of their service.
tasks.expected_outcome: A helpful reminder email is sent to the seller to avoid post-closing billing.
